# AVAudioSession.InterruptionType.began

**Case**

A type that indicates that the operating system began interrupting the audio session.

## Declaration

```swift
case began
```

## Interruption Types

- **AVAudioSession.InterruptionType.ended**: A type that indicates that the operating system ended interrupting the audio session.

items.description: A type that indicates that the operating system ended interrupting the audio session.
